name: Partner Pong
description:
How to Play:

  • 2 players required... (or two hands, I guess!)
  • Player 1 (left) - WASD
  • Player 2 (right) - Arrow Keys
  • You can rotate the paddle with horizontal inputs
  • Both players work together to maneuver the ball into crystals that appear
  • 2 minute timer - missing takes away 5 seconds
  • Getting a streak (no misses) of at least 3 leads to double points per smash
  • Can you beat 50 points?
